description:
Pearl is a creature that was born from http://anidb.net/ch14509 [Pandora]`s shoulder. He shares Pandora`s life. If either dies, as does the other.
Each Shinkan (神官) has one of these creatures. They look mostly the same, but can differ in eye colour, the colour of their gem, and the shape of their tail.
name: Kata no Mono Pearl
